attributes.action: commit to reducing the cost of employing Special Advisers by 25% within the next 12 months.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost of employing Special Advisers has increased significantly in the last 10 years. Their benefits are questionable and their negative PR impact would seen to outweigh their perceived value. Each ministry should be expected to justify each SA through a cost/benefit analysis. Starting at 0 buld a business case to justify both the number and type of SA's required.
